titleInfo.title: Annotated images of Rubik's cubes with three visible sides

mods.abstract:
This dataset includes images from two Rubik's Cubes on different surfaces with different lighting and varying configurations. The images were taken to always show three sides of a single Rubik's cube. Positions of the cubes in each image and the configurations have been annotated.
## Files
The dataset has been split into multiple files due to upload size restrictions. All four archives make up the full dataset.
The readme explains the annotation structure.
